bio: Nicola is a jewellery designer and goldsmith based in Toronto, Canada. She studied at George Brown College and earned her advanced diploma in Jewellery Arts. She is the recipient of the Umicore Precious Metals Award 2014 and has been featured in Toronto Life magazine as “homegrown talent”. Her jewellery brand Kai by Nicola is a line that exemplifies everyday luxury. With each piece being handcrafted, her designs are simple in form, with clean lines and soft shapes.
